  • Uses of BattleshipMessage in utilities

    Methods in utilities with parameters of type BattleshipMessage
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    BattleshipNetwork.endGame(BattleshipMessage message)
    This private method determines what happens after the game ends.
    private void
    BattleshipNetwork.isExceptionMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
    This private method determines if the message received is meant to notify the current player that an exception occurred with the other player.
    private void
    BattleshipNetwork.isMoveMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
    This private method determines if the message received contains a move that the other player just made.
    private void
    BattleshipNetwork.isUpdateGridMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
    This private method checks if the current message is meant to have the other player update their grid after they made a move.
